title: Can I use a DirectTV DVR without cable service? Last reply 30 mn ago by richiestang_78
content: You might be able to view the recordings which exist on it without service. That is about it. Even the ability to do that isn't universal. Making any recordings is highly unlikely.  Ordering service is pretty pointless. It's usually cheaper to get a two year contract which includes equipment and installation. Rather than paying month by month.
